meaningMnemonic:
When you <kanji>throw</kanji> out something and <kanji>abandon</kanji> it, you are essentially <vocabulary>dumping</vocabulary> it.

投棄 is a formal word for <vocabulary>throwing away</vocabulary> things, often used in the context of illegally dumping waste.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You learned the on'yomi for 投 when you learned 投資 a long time ago.
